titleStmt.title: SII 7.23: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 23. (A.R. No. 23 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . koṟcaṭapaṉmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīcuntarapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu patiṉālāvatuk ketirāvatu ṛṣabha nāyaṟṟu ṅkaṭkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa pūcattuṉāḷ koṅkāṉa vīracoḻamaṇṭalattu pūvāṇiya
ṉāṭṭu ṉāṭṭavarom Iṉṉāṭṭu tāramaṅkalattu mutalikaḷil niruṇi Iḷaiyāṉ nallauṭaiyappar taṅkaḷ mutaliyārperāl vaikkiṟa Iḷaiyaperumāḷ Akaramāṉa ttu bha ṭṭarkaḷukku Udakapūrvvadharmmadā ṉamāka kuṭutta kuḷamāvatu Iṉṉāṭṭu Amarakuṉṟipaṟṟil ceyyaperu
māḷeri Eṉṟu perkūṟappaṭṭa Ikkuḷattāl nirpāyum nañcai nilattukku perunāṉkellaiyāvatu kiḻpāṟkellai kañcamalaināyaṉār tevatāṉamā kku meṟkum Uṭaikuḷamum Uṭpaṭṭa nilamum teṉpāṟkellai Ikkuḷattāl nirpāyum Ellai
Aṟutiyākavum melpārkkellai Ikkuḷattu nirkovai yaṟutiyākavum vaṭapārkkellai Ikkuḷattāl nirpāyum Ellai yaṟitiyākavum Ippaṭi Iṉṉāṉkellaikkuṭpaṭ m Uṭaikuḷamu mitil meṉokkiṉa maramum kiṇokkiṉa kiṇaṟummaṟṟu meppeṟpaṭṭa samastaprāpti kaḷum Uṭ
paṭa sarvvamāniya Iṟaiyiliyāka Udaka pūrvvadharmmadānamā kak kuṭuttom Ivvakarattu bha ṭṭarkaḷukku yippaṭi kuṭutta kuḷam Iṉṉāḷmutal kaikkoṇṭu Uṭaikuḷaṅkaḷum Aṭaittu kāṭu veṭṭi tirutti tāṉ veṇṭu maṉaittup payirkaḷum ceytukoṇṭu candrāditya varai cella kallilum cempi
lum veṭṭi Aṉupavikkakaṭavarkaḷākavum Itu Ivarkaḷukku dānādhamanavikra yaṅkaḷukkum Urittāvutākavum Itu Ivarkaḷukku sarvv(ā)mānnya Iṟaiyiliyāvatākavum Ippaṭi cammatittu Iddharmmadānapramā ṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom śrīlakṣmaṇaccaturvvedi maṅkalattu bha ṭṭarkaḷukku pūvāṇiyanāṭṭu nāṭṭavarom
Ippaṭikku Ivai Amarakuṉṟiyil mutalikaḷil kaṭuntarkkamutaliyār Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai tāramaṅkalattu mutalikaḷil Āṉaiyār Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai cemmaṇikūṭal mutalikaḷil Āḷappiṟantār mutaliyār Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇapatinallūr mutalikaḷil piḷḷaiyappaṉ Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai ceṭṭimāṅkuṟicciyil mutalikaḷil Iḷamāṇṭai cokkaṉāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muppavvaicamuttirattil kuṭiyaṉ Āṇ(ṭ)aipiḷḷaiyappaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muppacamuttirattil mutalikaḷil kuṭiyaṉ nakkaṉ mutali Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai māṟamaṅkalattil mutalikaḷil cuvaṭaṉ
ceyyāṉ kuṉṟakāmuṇṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai veḷḷaṟaipaḷḷiyil mutalikaḷil cākāṭaṉ Iḷamaṉ perumāḷkkāmuṇṭaṉ kaimmāṭṭāṅkāṉamaikku tiruveḷḷaṟaiyuṭaiyāṉ paṅkayaccelviyāṉa Ulakaṉ Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 7.23 by automatically converted to DHARMA conventions.
